candidates.title: Feat/docs
candidates.body:
<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
## Summary by CodeRabbit

- **New Features**
  - Added middleware support with path scoping, ordered execution, request/response mutation, and optional short-circuiting.
  - Introduced a public, high-performance byte-oriented request data container with UTF-8-aware keys, memory utilities, and convenient iteration.

- **Documentation**
  - New guides for request body handling (JSON, form, text, empty), content-type and UTF-8 behavior.
  - New guide for the byte-oriented request data store with examples, performance notes, and best practices.

- **Refactor**
  - Internal reorganization of the request data module; API surface preserved where applicable.

- **Chores**
  - Removed outdated blog example application.
<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

candidates.title: Fix/refactor
candidates.body:
<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
## Summary by CodeRabbit

- **New Features**
  - Structured form-data support with builders, iteration, conversions, and URL encode/decode helpers (query-string rendering/parsing).
  - Request bodies and helpers now use and expose the structured form-data and a method to access all parameters; body types expose MIME type strings.

- **Chores**
  - Internal error logging redirected to stdout.
  - Added an external URL-encoding dependency.

- **Tests**
  - Added and updated tests covering form-data behavior, encoding/decoding, and related request handling.
<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

candidates.title: Feat/docs
candidates.body:
<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
## Summary by CodeRabbit

- New Features
  - Added a FormData utility for creating, editing, and iterating over form-like key–value data.
  - Supports parsing from and generating URL-encoded query strings for round‑trips.
  - Exposed a request body module in the request API surface.

- Tests
  - Added tests covering FormData basics, value appending, and query string round‑trip behavior.

- Chores
  - Added a URL-encoding dependency.
  - Switched internal error logging output destination.
<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

candidates.title: Feat/hyper
candidates.body:
<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **New Features**
  * Migrated the server framework from Actix to Hyper and Routerify, enhancing routing, middleware, and static file serving.
  * Introduced a redesigned middleware system with simplified interfaces, including updated CORS and logger middleware variants.
  * Added support for OPTIONS HTTP method and empty request/response bodies.
  * Improved static file serving with URI rewriting, conditional GET, and caching support.
  * Added helper utilities for middleware execution and query parameter serialization.

* **Bug Fixes**
  * Enhanced cookie parsing and header management in request and response handling.

* **Refactor**
  * Refactored middleware and handler interfaces to use references and return optional responses for greater flexibility.
  * Updated request and response types to replace Actix dependencies with Hyper and Cookie crates.
  * Simplified and adapted test cases to align with the new middleware and request/response APIs.

* **Tests**
  * Commented out CORS middleware tests pending further updates.
  * Adjusted logger middleware tests to new invocation style.

* **Style**
  * Reformatted TypeScript test code for improved readability and consistency.
<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

candidates.title: Trying out hyper instead of actix for more control
Remove WebSocket implementation and related tests
candidates.body: I removed the websocket implementation i will be making a different lib like ws for that

candidates.title: Added send method to websocket implementation
Add WebSocket support with registration and callback functionality
Remove unused example projects and update README to reflect changes
Add blog example with CRUD API and update .gitignore
Bump version to 0.3.5 and make helper testing functions private
Added a test for listen and working on middlewares
